description:
This bonus pack will really kick-start your career. With seven level 2 upgrades (chassis, brakes, tyres, suspensions, gearbox, radiator, engine), you can clock the best times from the very first races.
You'll also enjoy the ideal conditions in which to start your career:
• Tyre warmers so you can start the race at the perfect temperature
• Optimum fall management so you can get back on your bike quickly
• Bonus experience points for the team
• Bonus reputation points for podium finishes
name: TT Isle of Man 2 Pro Newcomer Pack
